scripts.db:init: node -e "const DatabaseInitializer = require('./database/init-db'); const config = require('./config'); new DatabaseInitializer(config.dataBase).initialize().then(() => console.log('Database initialized successfully')).catch(err => { console.error('Database initialization failed:', err); process.exit(1); })"
scripts.db:seed: node -e "const DatabaseInitializer = require('./database/init-db'); const config = require('./config'); new DatabaseInitializer(config.dataBase).seedData().then(() => console.log('Seed data inserted successfully')).catch(err => { console.error('Seed data insertion failed:', err); process.exit(1); })"
